project.name: C-C400B-WIRE-02-ST02-DT03-DF16-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C400B-WIRE-02-ST02-DT03-DF16-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_rmVjU6oZgl

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-WIRE-02-ST02-DT03-DF16-CF24-01-GOOD-02

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_c6HHocQVHO

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-WIRE-02-ST02-DT03-DF16-CF24-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_brdfuhqAWVbMqTE5cRqb AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_gtrLRdrxRP)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_gtrLRdrxRP))))
